comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: Hi! Here www.flickr.com/photos/47572660@N08/4359868941/sizes/o/in/... is a photo from the same area taken by myself around 2000. As you can see, the general look of the area, which is called Smith's Hill by locals, has changed dramatically. This now disused lighthouse used to be the symbol on the blazer pocket of Wollongong High School students. Not sure whether that still applies.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, Wardie44B. It's interesting to compare the two photos and see how the landscape has changed over time.

comment.author: 55736831@N05
comment._content: Hi, tomorrow I will publish your photo in an article devoted to lighthouses. Thanks: www.viviturismo.it
